title: Json Filter Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi Json Filter Filter

extractIsolatedStrings.description: Extract string values in arrays (without keys).

extractAllPairs.description: Extract all key-value pairs for translation. When false, use extractionRules to specify which paths to extract.

exceptions.description: Comma-separated list of keys to exclude from extraction.

useKeyAsName.description: Use JSON key as the Block (TextUnit) name for reference.

useCodeFinder.description: Enable inline code detection using codeFinderRules patterns.

useFullKeyPath.description: Use full path (/key1/key2) instead of immediate key as name.

useLeadingSlashOnKeyPath.description: Include leading slash in key path names.

rules.description: List of regex patterns to detect inline codes

pattern.description: Regex pattern for inline code detection

sample.description: Sample text to test patterns against

useAllRulesWhenTesting.description: Test all rules together or individually

escapeForwardSlashes.description: Escape forward slashes in output JSON (\/).

noteRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become translator notes.

extractionRules.description: Regex pattern for JSON paths to extract. Overrides extractAllPairs when specified.

idRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become Block IDs (overrides useKeyAsName).

genericMetaRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become generic metadata.

simplifierRules.description: Simplifier rules for code type normalization

x-groups.label: Extraction Settings
x-groups.description: Control what content is extracted for translation

x-groups.label: Key Handling
x-groups.description: Configure how JSON keys are used

x-groups.label: Inline Code Detection
x-groups.description: Configure detection of inline codes (placeholders, tags)
